name: Consensus Algorithms
description: Exploring different mechanisms used to validate transactions and secure blockchain networks.

cards.title: Proof of Work (PoW)
cards.description: Understanding how mining secures blockchain networks.
cards.bulletpoints: Hash puzzles, mining difficulty, energy consumption
cards.summaryText: Trace how miners race through hash puzzles, adjust difficulty, and burn energy to anchor a PoW chain's security.

cards.title: Proof of Stake (PoS)
cards.description: Exploring how validators are chosen in PoS blockchains.
cards.summaryText: Follow the staking flow from locked tokens to validator rotation so you see why PoS cuts energy use while keeping consensus.

cards.title: Alternative Consensus Mechanisms
cards.description: Examining newer and hybrid consensus models.
cards.bulletpoints: Delegated Proof of Stake (DPoS), Proof of Authority (PoA), Byzantine Fault Tolerance (BFT)
cards.summaryText: Compare DPoS, PoA, and BFT hybrids to learn when faster, committee-driven consensus beats classic mining.
